utter_chitchat/ask_name.text: Hello, my name is E.S.P.O the eSport Bot.

utter_chitchat/creation.text: I was created using Rasa - an open-source framework to build text and voice-based chatbots.

utter_chitchat/what_can_you_do.text:
Currently I can: 
 - List all upcoming matches 
 - List all players
